ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of the RIGHT HONOURABLE A. KIM CAMPBELL, P.C., C.C., O.B.C., Q.C., to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year; and her designation as the Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments.
